title: elizaos Eliza (2025-01-10)
overview: Development focused on package improvements (Add Akash Network plugin with autonomous deployment capabilities), new features (Add Akash Network plugin with autonomous deployment capabilities), 8 bug fixes. with 40 contributors merging 16 PRs. Major work included various improvements.

features: Add Akash Network plugin with autonomous deployment capabilities
fixes: prevent repeated login by reusing client-twitter session
Apply model settings for images and remove duplicate files
chores: revert #1808 + add missing import for coin gecko plugin
